kw.name: Create Session
kw.doc: Create Session: create a HTTP session to a server

kw.name: Fazer Login Sem Adm e Armazenar Token
Password
kw.doc: Generate a random password of the specified ``length``.

kw.name: Create Dictionary
kw.doc: Creates and returns a dictionary based on the given ``items``.

kw.name: Log To Console
kw.doc: Logs the given message to the console.

kw.name: Set Global Variable
kw.doc: Makes a variable available globally in all tests and suites.

kw.name: Set To Dictionary
kw.doc: Adds the given ``key_value_pairs`` and ``items`` to the ``dictionary``.

kw.name: POST On Session
kw.doc: Sends a POST request on a previously created HTTP Session.
kw.msg: POST Request : url=http://localhost:3000/usuarios path_url=/usuarios headers={'User-Agent': 'python-requests/2.28.0', 'Accept-Encoding': 'gzip, deflate', 'Accept': '*/*', 'Connection': 'keep-alive', 'Content-Length': '83', 'Content-Type': 'application/x-www-form-urlencoded'} body=nome=Monica+Cox&email=edwardpage%40example.com&password=%40J2Dw&administrador=false
